short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorts AWS tabs in a more logical order and group by service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension designed to tackle the tab sprawl that comes from using the AWS Web Client. Allows for filtering based on service, or category (defined by AWS's list of services).
